name.ja: <ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>翔<rt>しょう</rt></ruby><ruby>月<rt>げっ</rt></ruby><ruby>煌<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>か</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: If you have a Celestial Warrior Type Fusion Monster or "Kimeluna the Dark Shifter" face-up on your field, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
